cm.model
Class Encounter

java.lang.Object
  cm.model.Encounter

public class Encounter
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a D&D 4e encounter.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Rinehart <gomamon2k at yahoo.com>

Constructor Summary

Encounter

public Encounter(StatLibrary statLibrary,
                 java.lang.Boolean useRoleMod,
                 javax.swing.JFrame parent)
Creates a new encounter using the given StatLibrary.

Parameters:
statLibrary - the StatLibrary
useRoleMod - if true, rolls will be modified according to fighter role
parent - the parent frame for dialog boxes

add

public void add(Stats stats,
                java.lang.Boolean libUpdate)
Adds a new Combatant with the supplied stats to the encounter. Calls add(Combatant, Boolean, Boolean) with a final parameter of 'true'.

Parameters:
stats - the Stats
libUpdate - if true, calls Combatant.updateLibrary(StatLibrary, Boolean)

add

public void add(Combatant combatant,
                java.lang.Boolean libUpdate,
                java.lang.Boolean configEntry)
Adds a new Combatant to the encounter.

Parameters:
combatant - the Combatant
libUpdate - if true, calls Combatant.updateLibrary(StatLibrary, Boolean)
configEntry - if true, updates a non-PC's fighter number from 0 to 1

startFight

public void startFight(java.lang.Boolean groupSimilar)
Rolls initiative for all in the roster and selects the current fighter.

Parameters:
groupSimilar - if true, similar NPCs will share the same initiative count

finishCurrentTurn

public void finishCurrentTurn()
Finishes the current fighter's turn and starts the next fighter's turn.

fighterInitRollUpdate

public void fighterInitRollUpdate(java.lang.String combatHandle,
                                  java.lang.Integer init)
Updates the initiative roll of the fighter with the given combat handle to the result provided.

Parameters:
combatHandle - the combat handle
init - the new init roll
See Also:
fighterInitUpdate(String, Integer, Integer, Integer, Boolean)

fighterUndoTurn

public void fighterUndoTurn(java.lang.String combatHandle)
Reverses initiative tracking to the start of the turn of the fighter with the supplied combat handle.

Parameters:
combatHandle - the combat handle
See Also:
fighterUndoTurn(Combatant)

clearAll

public void clearAll()
Resets the encounter to default (empty) values.

clearNPCs

public void clearNPCs()
Remvoes all enemies from the roster and resets the encounter.

clearPCs

public void clearPCs()
Removes all PCs from the roster and resets the encounter.

clearSelectedFighter

public void clearSelectedFighter()
Calls setSelectedFighterHandle(String) with a parameter of "".

Adds the provided effect to the encounter.

Parameters:

See Also:
#effectAdd(String, String, String, Duration, Boolean)

effectAdd

public void effectAdd(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String source,
                      java.lang.String target,
                      EffectBase.Duration dur,
                      java.lang.Boolean beneficial)
Adds a new Effect to the encounter with the provided properties.

Parameters:
name - the name of the effect
source - the source handle of the effect
target - the target handle of the effect
dur - the EffectBase.Duration of the effect
beneficial - true if the effect is beneficial to the target

effectChange

public void effectChange(Effect eff)
Updates effect duration when an effect has changed.

Parameters:
eff - the effect

effectRemove

public void effectRemove(java.lang.Integer id)
Sets the Effect with the given effect ID to be inactive.

Parameters:
id - the effect ID

moveToTop

public void moveToTop(Combatant fighter)
Relocates the provided fighter to the top of the initiative order.

Parameters:
fighter - the Combatant
See Also:
fighterInitMatch(String, String, Boolean)

remove

public void remove(java.lang.String combatHandle)
Removes a given fighter from the roster.

Parameters:
combatHandle - the fighter's combat handle

resetEncounter

public void resetEncounter(java.lang.Boolean resetPCs)
Resets initiative for all Combatants in the encounter.

Parameters:
resetPCs - if true, resets health and power usage for PCs in addition to enemies

rollOneInit

public void rollOneInit(Combatant fighter)
Rolls initiative for a single fighter, and starts their turn if it puts them at the top of the list.

Parameters:
fighter - the Combatant for which we are rolling

size

public java.lang.Integer size()
Returns the size of the encounter roster.

Returns:
getRoster().size()

takeShortRest

public void takeShortRest()
Removes all enemies from the roster and applies a short rest to the PCs.

takeShortRestWithMilestone

public void takeShortRestWithMilestone()
Removes all enemies from the roster and applies a short rest to the PCs. Also grants an action point to each PC.

takeExtendedRest

public void takeExtendedRest()
Removes all enemies from the roster and applies an extended rest to the PCs.

updateAllStats

public void updateAllStats(java.lang.Boolean configEntries)
Calls Combatant.updateLibrary(StatLibrary, Boolean) for each fighter in the roster.

Parameters:
configEntries - this is passed as the second parameter to Combatant.updateLibrary(StatLibrary, Boolean)
See Also:
getStatLib()

loadFromFile

public java.lang.Boolean loadFromFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                      java.lang.Boolean clearBeforeLoading)
Loads encounter data from a file.

Parameters:
filename - the filename to load from
clearBeforeLoading - true if the encounter should be cleared before loading the file
Returns:
true on success

saveToFile

public java.lang.Boolean saveToFile(java.lang.String filename)
Writes the encounter data out to a file.

Parameters:
filename - the filename to save to
Returns:
true on success
